title: 一个奇特的发现
author: 我被盗号了
txt_content:
本帖最后由 我被盗号了 于 2012-11-21 20:27 编辑 

官网的亮点：
Minecraft Community on Steam – Over 40000 members!Minecraft on RedditCraftHubWorld of MinecraftMinecraft on Mod DBMinecrafting.ru – A Russian forumMinecraft forum – A Spanish forumMinecraft Workbench – Texture packs, mods and skinsMinecraft.fr – A French Minecraft site, potato cubes!Minecraftfr.com – Another French Minecraft community.Minecraft-France – French Minecraft community.Nederlands Minecraft forum – Dutch Minecraft community.mcbbs.net – One of the biggest Chinese Minecraft communities.（亮点）
自己寻找

replies.author: likeliang
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 likeliang 于 2012-11-21 20:26 编辑
